data.title: Bank of America Plaza
data.meta_description: 300 Convent Street, San Antonio, Texas 78205. Office building constructed in 1983, renovated in 2017, 532,922 sqft, 28 floors, downtown San Antonio, Texas.
data.text:
300 Convent Street, San Antonio, Texas 78205

Bank of America Plaza, a premier core Class A office building located in the heart of downtown San Antonio, Texas. The building is positioned in the nucleus of growth for new development and employment in the CBD. Rising 28 stories, the institutionally-maintained, 534,184-square-foot landmark tower features the highest quality finishes and amenities among its peers in the CBD. The tenants provided tremendous stability and a reliable cash flow base from which to build value. In addition, excellent value enhancement potential exists through the lease up of vacant and rolling space to rapidly appreciating central business district office rental rates.

Griffin Partners acquired the building in 2014 and sold it in 2017 to USAA Real Estate.
